***** Translingual[edit] *****
[//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/43/
Devanagari_%E0%A4%85%E0%A4%82.svg/220px-Devanagari_%E0%A4%85%E0%A4%82.svg.png]
**** Letter[edit] ****
अं
   1. A character of the Devanagari script. It is used to denote the
      nasalization sound represented by the anusvara, but in this form it is
      sometimes classified as a vowel in its own right.
***** Dhivehi[edit] *****
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * IPA(key): /əŋ/, [aŋ]
**** Letter[edit] ****
अं • (aṅ)
   1. The thirteenth vowel in Dhivehi, written in Devanagari script
***** Hindi[edit] *****
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * (Delhi Hindi) IPA(key): /ə̃/
    * See ं (̃) for more pronunciation information.
**** Letter[edit] ****
अं • (ã)
   1. the twelfth vowel in Hindi
